Preview a Pristine Seas palette

Source: R/colors.R
ps_show_palette.Rd

Quick visualization helper to inspect palettes at a glance.

Usage

ps_show_palette(palette, show_labels = TRUE, ncol = NULL)

Arguments

palette

Character. Palette name passed to ps_colors().

show_labels

Logical. Whether to display category labels. Default TRUE.

ncol

Integer. Number of columns for the swatch grid. Default NULL (auto).

Value

A ggplot object if ggplot2 is available; otherwise invisibly returns NULL after plotting.

Details

If ggplot2 is installed, returns a ggplot swatch plot. Otherwise, draws a simple base R swatch plot.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
ps_show_palette("trophic_group")
ps_show_palette("functional_groups", ncol = 3)
} # }
